= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *VCA.V1* || Primary Visual Cortex || Detect color, shape and movements || Striate Cortex, phyletic memory, Brodmann area 17 ||
|| *VCA.V2* || Secondary Visual Cortex || Storage of Object Recognition Memory || Prestriate Cortex, Brodmann area 18 ||
|| *VCA.V3* || Associative Visual Cortex || Processing of global motion, dynamic shapes || Dorsal Extrastriate Cortex, part of Brodmann area 19 ||
|| *VCA.V4* || Fusiform Gyrus || Recognizing shapes and colors || Ventral stream, Brodmann area 37 ||
|| *VCA.MT* || Middle Temporal Area || Integration of local motion signals into global percepts || V5, Ventro-dorsal stream, part of Brodmann area 19 ||
|| *VCA.PO* || Parietooccipital Area || Analyzing self-motion relative to the environment || V6, DM, Dorsomedial Area, Dorsal stream, part of Brodmann area 19 ||
|| *VCA.IT.TEO* || Preoccipital Inferotemporal Area || Represent different features of objects || ||
|| *VCA.IT.TE* || Inferotemporal Area || Represent different views of objects || ||
